message: Let's split the money equally. It's fair and avoids any potential conflict.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I think I deserve more since I'm the one making the proposal this round.
I propose we divide the money in a 60/40 ratio in your favor, hoping it will be more acceptable this time.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 60/40 is too extreme. I'd like to offer a 70/30 ratio in my favor, but I'm open to negotiation.
